previousJobDetails.description: Place where I started my career as Junior Game programmer. I Made both games and apps for Android and IOS platforms in 3D & 2D. Core game programming, creating Bots, animations are my Favourites
A Baby startup, foucsed in Realtime Quiz games. The best thing learned are How to become an Entrepreneur, How to build a Startup from scratch, Social media marketing and campaigns etc..
Developed complete games using Flutter - Android with backend Node js

appGallery.title: Numzy - How Fast Is Your Brain ?
appGallery.description: The best puzzle games are deceptively simple to play while offering a brain-busting challenge. This describes NUMZY, a crazy number game that apart from being fun, tests your agility, vision, speed, simple calculations and brain power.

appGallery.title: TROLO: To-Do, Reminder, Tasks, Panchang, News
appGallery.description: TROLO is more than your mobile personal digital assistant and to-do planner. Make use of our advanced meeting alerts, GPS location reminders, to-dos & scheduling to improve effectiveness and practice effective time management. You can use TROLO to track your fitness goals, monitor expenses, and view news at a glance.

appGallery.title: QUNO - Learn | Play | Win
appGallery.description: Quno is a Dual Mode Trivia Game at present.
